original_text: Recab's son, Malkijah, repaired the Dung Gate. He put the doors in their place, as well as their wooden bars and iron bars. Malkijah had authority over the region of Beth Hakkerem.
korean_text: 분문은 벧학게렘 지방을 다스리는 레갑의 아들 말기야가 중수하여 문을 세우며 문짝을 달고 자물쇠와 빗장을 갖추었고

sentences.original_text: Recab's son, Malkijah, repaired the Dung Gate.
sentences.korean_translation: 레갑의 아들 말기야가 분문 gate를 수리했다.

sentences.original_text: He put the doors in their place,
as well as their wooden bars and iron bars.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 나무 막대와 쇠 막대들도 놓았다.

sentences.original_text: Malkijah had authority over the region of Beth Hakkerem.
